meanings.definition: A small tree or shrub native to Australia.
meanings.sent1: The currajong provided shade in the hot Australian sun.
meanings.sent2: We saw a currajong while hiking in the Australian outback.
meanings.sent3: The curious kangaroo rested under the currajong tree.
meanings.sent4: The currajong stood tall like a guardian of the bushland.
meanings.sent5: The vibrant green leaves of the currajong danced in the breeze.

meanings.definition: The edible seeds of the currajong tree.
meanings.sent1: The indigenous people gathered currajong seeds for food.
meanings.sent2: I sprinkled crushed currajong seeds on my salad for extra flavor.
meanings.sent3: The mischievous squirrel stole the currajong seeds from the picnic.
meanings.sent4: The currajong seeds were like tiny treasures hidden in the forest.
meanings.sent5: The aroma of roasted currajong seeds filled the kitchen.

meanings.definition: A type of fabric made from the fibers of the currajong tree.
meanings.sent1: She wore a dress made of soft currajong fabric.
meanings.sent2: The traditional clothing was woven from currajong fibers.
meanings.sent3: The fashion designer created a stunning gown using currajong material.
meanings.sent4: The curtains made of currajong fabric added a cozy touch to the room.
meanings.sent5: The delicate texture of the currajong fabric was a delight to touch.
